item.description: All hail Aragorn! In honor of 2012 Coolidge Award recipient Viggo Mortensen, the Coolidge Corner Theatre is screening the complete Lord of the Rings trilogy - The Fellowship of the Ring (extended cut), The Two Towers (extended cut), and The Return of the King (theatrical director's cut) - on Sun, March 4 at 11:00 am. Tickets for the entire marathon are $20. More info at: http://www.coolidge.o.... Note that Viggo Mortensen is not scheduled to appear at this event, but will be taking part in two other events at the Coolidge. For details: http://www.coolidge.o....
item.name: Lord of the Rings Trilogy: Marathon Screening at the Coolidge!
